about_the_game:
In the middle of the forest stands a huge tree, its height rivals smaller mountains. Between the branches of the giant tree someone established a small shelter, away from all earthly perils. There is only a single entrance, a lift between the branches. Upon arrival it becomes apparent that small roads along the branches connect several platforms. On the arrival level you can see a small warehouse, some watchtowers, two cages - probably for prisoners - and a branch lined with exploding barrels. Near to the trunk of the tree, there are additional lifts that take you higher among the dense foliage of the tree ...

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
detailed_description:
In the middle of the forest stands a huge tree, its height rivals smaller mountains. Between the branches of the giant tree someone established a small shelter, away from all earthly perils. There is only a single entrance, a lift between the branches. Upon arrival it becomes apparent that small roads along the branches connect several platforms. On the arrival level you can see a small warehouse, some watchtowers, two cages - probably for prisoners - and a branch lined with exploding barrels. Near to the trunk of the tree, there are additional lifts that take you higher among the dense foliage of the tree ...

This DLC contains 3 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Giant Tree Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
